description.about: 7.1 Surround Sound Audio System with custom subwoofer and speaker units.
description.coding: MPU programming with Atmega8 for input control, LCD display, and rotary encoder.
description.hardware: Pioneer TS-W1212D4 Subwoofer, Sony XS-FB162E Speakers, Sony XM-N1004 Amplifiers, Atmega8, LCD 16x2, Rotary Encoder, Custom PCB, CPU Cabinet.
description.additional: Self-designed cabinet and controller unit for immersive sound.

description.about: An automatic irrigation system for agricultural fields.
description.coding: Microcontroller logic to read moisture and control valves.
description.hardware: Moisture Sensor, Atmega8, Relay, Solenoid Valve, LEDs.
description.additional: Controls water flow based on soil moisture levels. Used in college project.

description.about: Multi-functional development board for embedded experiments.
description.coding: Includes relay, TRIAC, keypad, segment display and LED matrix control.
description.hardware: Atmega8, LED Matrix, 4x4 Keypad, Relay, TRIAC, MOC, 16x2 LCD, 7 Segment Display.
description.additional: Custom fabricated PCB using iron transfer and FeCl3 etching.

description.about: Smart RGB LED Lamps with Alexa Control.
description.coding: HTML-based control panel hosted on ESP8266 with SinricPro integration.
description.additional: WiFi control + voice commands + local UI panel.

description.about: Laser beam based intruder detection system.
description.additional: Activates light when laser beam is broken. Delays off for 15 seconds.

description.coding: Custom coded animations with AVR MCU.

description.about: Set of small form-factor portable speaker systems.
description.coding: Bluetooth input routing with amplifier circuit.
description.hardware: PAM8403, TP4056, 2.5" and 3" Speakers, Li-ion Battery.

description.about: College project to build quadcopter with custom PCBs.
WiFi controlled RC car using phone sensors.
description.coding: Phone accelerometer input mapped to servo/motor control via ESP.
description.hardware: Atmega8, ULN2003, ESP8266, Servo, Li-ion Battery.
description.additional: Direction and speed controlled remotely via mobile.

description.about: Touchless water tap using IR sensors.
description.coding: Flow detection and solenoid valve control.
description.additional: Auto on/off tap for water conservation.

description.about: Smart AC socket with timer-based on/off functionality.
description.coding: Time set via buttons and controlled by microcontroller.
description.additional: Programmable plug socket for consumer usage.

description.about: USB switch to share mouse/keyboard/headset between two PCs.
description.coding: Push button toggles active USB host.
